thread.title: Malika Favre's Gorgeous Illustrations Blend Women into Their Environments
thread.title_full: Malika Favre's Gorgeous Illustrations Blend Women into Their Environments

author: Beckett Mufson
title: Malika Favre's Gorgeous Illustrations Blend Women into Their Environments
text:
Malika Favre's Gorgeous Illustrations Blend Women into Their Environments The French artist's bold, minimal renderings evoke both youthful energy and classy elegance. 
Whether exploring the world , ruling the workplace , or relaxing in luxury , the women in the French-born, UK-based Malika Favre 's illustrations are as cool as their scenes are cinematic. 
Her high-chroma, low-detail renditions of women just being create a fabulous atmosphere, often telling smaller snippets of grand stories. Her tactical use of bold colorways emboldens steamy bedroom scenes, boardroom vignettes, and even one stellar portrait of Beyonc√© from the Lemonade visual album. The visual harmonies between her subjects and their surroundings create resonant, satisfying visuals every single time. 
Favre is a staple of the London design community, contributing work to The New Yorker , Vanity Fair , the Financial Times , Criterion, and more. Check out her work below: 
Follow Malika Favre here , and check out the Creators Instagram to find your next favorite artist.
